biography: Pemphero Chikadza is a dedicated student pastor currently pursuing his Bachelor's In Theology. He has a passion for youth ministry and community outreach.
Chikumbutso Phiri is a student pastor focused on youth ministry. He is currently enrolled in a Bachelor's program in Theology.
Jelomy Bwanali is enthusiastic about music ministry and is pursuing a Master's degree in Christian Music. He hopes to lead worship services in the future.
